job_tasks.phrase: verder ontwikkelen en vormgeven van ons Drupal CMS
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing and shaping a content management system, which is a software application.

job_tasks.phrase: vertaalt samen met het team een functionele behoefte naar een passende oplossing binnen het Drupal CMS
job_tasks.justification: This describes translating functional requirements into software solutions within a CMS, a fundamental software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: een stuk maatwerk implementeren met PHP
job_tasks.justification: Implementing custom features using a programming language is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: meewerkt aan de front-end in javascript
job_tasks.justification: Front-end development using JavaScript is a standard software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: een externe koppeling moet opzetten en inrichten
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and configuring external integrations is part of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: beheer je ook het platform waar Drupal op draait, waarbij je bezig bent met de backend van het systeem
job_tasks.justification: Managing the backend of a system is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met Marketing & Communicatie vertaal je wensen naar hoogwaardige oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: Translating business wishes into solutions involves understanding business needs and applying technical expertise.

job_tasks.phrase: zorg je voor een goed beheersbaar platform
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring a manageable platform implies maintaining and structuring the software system.

job_tasks.phrase: werken we de komende tijd hard aan verbeteringen van de website, waaronder de presentatie van onze opleidingen en minoren
job_tasks.justification: Improving website features and presentation is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: continu bezig met het verbeteren van de prestaties van de website
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing website performance is a software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: doorontwikkeling van de UX, homepage, menu en zoekfunctionaliteit
job_tasks.justification: Developing user experience, navigation, and search functionality are all software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: onderzoeken we hoe generatieve AI onze redacteuren kan ondersteunen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes investigating how generative AI can support business users (editors), which falls under understanding business needs and potential technological solutions, rather than direct AI development.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement clearly defines the role as an experienced PHP Developer focused on the Drupal CMS. The primary tasks involve traditional software development, integration, and backend management. While generative AI is mentioned, it is in the context of an exploratory investigation into how it can support editors, not as a core development responsibility for this role. No AI/ML specific technologies or tasks are required, aligning the role with the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the core responsibilities, technologies, and the nature of the role. The mention of generative AI is secondary and exploratory, making the classification of the role as a 'Software Engineer' unambiguous.
